Posts.Content: Hi deb, I’m 28 and have triple negative breast cancer. 6cm tumour, no spread and I’m not a carrier of the gene fault. When I was first diagnosed and even still some days I’ve had horrendous back pain. Like nothing I’ve ever experienced before. Right across the middle. My bone scan was clear. My ct showed 2 lung spots but they could be anything and I had a bad chest infection earlier in the year so could be scarring. I was also a smoker prior to diagnosis. So don’t worry! I know that’s easier said than done. I figured mines is postural as even though your not aware your likely carrying yourself differently. Stay positive and carry on, don’t let cancer win. JoleneÂ
Posts.Title: Stressed/Anxious
